name: BlockRush
description:
1.  Have fun while maneuvering around a variety of different maze's
  2.  Avoid the enemies at all costs! 
  3.  Reach the goal before the time runs out  
  4. Ten levels designed to test your patience and skills
  5.  Secrets could be triggered around every corner, so be prepared
  6.  More to come in future with different in game power ups
  7.  Side by Side multiplayer in the works to see who can complete the level   in the fastest time
  8.  Feedback is welcomed and encouraged
